text: Multiple alignments based on the deduced aa sequences of putative RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp) genes in dsRNA contigs were obtained using ClustalX 2.0 (23) and MEGA5 software (42) . Phylogenetic analyses were conducted using MrBayes 3.2.3 (36) with the model of aa substitution, RtREV+I+G+F, selected by ProtTest2.4 (1), as judged by the Akaike information criterion (33) . Bayesian analyses with the covarion parameter were run with one run and four chains for 1,000,000 generations.
